speaker.name: Raghotham Sripadraj
speaker.biography: Raghotham is an AI Architect at PayPal and leads AI teams for the Customer Success Platform. He comes with rich background in building AI platforms and teams for startups and large enterprises. Drawing on his deep love for data science and neural networks and his passion for teaching, Raghotham has conducted workshops across the world and given talks at a number of data science conferences. Apart from getting his hands dirty with data, he loves traveling, Pink Floyd, and masala dosas.
